name: Downright Excessive Renaming Project
description: Choose from a massive number of options that provide better, shorter, or more organized names for weapons, gear, and suits. Includes many orthographic changes to text in the HUD, menus, missions, objectives, challenges, maps, and miscellaneous items.

options.name: On

english.769470354:
A note hastily written on the inside of a paper airplane:

"I am being held captive. To the holder of this message, please call the embassy. ANY embassy. Reward guaranteed!"

"Guaranteed" has been underscored twice.
english.1188297509:
A faded note inside of an old bottle. From the state of it, it must have been in the water for years. It reads:

"Finally made it to Ambrose, got a room from the bar owner. She's so kind. None of the pirate crews want to take me on yet, but they spend more time bickering than raiding anyway. I'm going to show them how it's done. Everyone'll have a place on Sinhi's crew. If you find this bottle, come and see for yourself!"
english.2873711932:
A note found with some confiscated luggage, which reads:

"Day 10. Left Port Dickson later than expected. Chief mate reassigned some of the crew. No changes to manifest in spite of all of this. Suspicious??? Will need to observe further."
english.3867278391:
A damp scrap of paper smuggled out among some dirty dishes, reading:

"I am being held against my will. I am an important government operative, and if you help me I will make sure you are protected and rewarded. This is not a joke!"
english.4219784335:
A note written (with impressive delicacy) on a square of toilet paper.

"Day ??. I'm so tired of the shocks at night, and during the day every glimpse of the sun is like a glimpse of heaven. At least the food's good. The crewman keeps crying and he barely eats. But that means there's more for me."

The last line of text is followed by a simplistic drawing of a devil emoji.

options.tooltip: Adjusts the names of many of the guns to be little more consistent and sort into groups better.

english.104665560: A TAC-12 Room Clearer Shotgun that's only effective at very close range.

english.4223760137: • Eliminate 100 Syndicate Members or Leaders with headshots using any Druzhina 34.

english.1986944028: This TAC fully automatic machine pistol can achieve extremely high rates of fire, and can eliminate someone quickly if sights are kept on target.

english.579457892: A covert variant of the Hackl Leviathan sniper rifle. The ICA's latest model of the Leviathan is a modern marksman's rifle. Silenced and deadly.
english.1054547267: A unique "Rude Ruby" variant of the Sieger MP577 Raptor Covert. This modern SMG is capable of rapid firing and has generous magazine capacity. Despite the loud color it's suppressed for user convenience.
english.1545523143: A covert variant of the Hackl Leviathan sniper rifle with a little added flair. Based on the ICA's latest model of the Leviathan, it's as silent to the ear as it is loud to the eye.
english.2817266057: An ICA variant of the Sieger MP577 Raptor. A modern SMG. Rapid firing with good magazine capacity.
english.2872511091: A DTI variant of the Custom 5mm. A concealable pistol. Ergonomically designed to pass pat-downs and frisking attempts. Utilizes caseless ammunition and cannot be reloaded while in the field.
english.2873352539: A covert variant of the Bartoli 12G Tactical shotgun. Agile and effective at close ranges. Has a fast fire rate and tight spread. This is the silenced version.
english.3554158002: A covert, ICA variant of the Sieger MP577 Raptor. A modern SMG. Rapid firing with good magazine capacity. Comes with a suppressor.
english.3947027254: A modern tactical shotgun. Agile and effective at close ranges. Has a fast fire rate and tight spread.

english.1429208340: A modern assault rifle. Fully-automatic. High damage but only semi-accurate. Virtually identical to the regular Shashka A33.
english.3094023402: A golden variant of the Bartoli 12G Sawed-Off. A U.S. produced pump-action shotgun. Designed for domestic and international markets. Has a lower accuracy, but it's small enough to hide in your pockets.

english.586270338: Eliminate Filiberto Newbold with the Majestic
english.941374167: Eliminate Virgilio Nelms with the Majestic
english.1327172161: Eliminate Hui Hou with the Majestic
english.2991512339: Eliminate Lavern Cancel with the Majestic

options.name: Realistic Naming
options.tooltip: Replaces fictional Bartoli, Custom 5mm, Hackl, Krugermeier, and HWK and with more realistic Beretta, Browning, Glock, Ruger, and Walther names.

english.UI_FIREARMS_HERO_SHOTGUN_EXOTIC01_DESC: A Tavor CTSG Room Clearer Shotgun that's only effective at very close range.

english.4223760137: • Eliminate 100 Syndicate Members or Leaders with headshots using any Dragunov SVD.

english.731709530: A U.S.-produced pump-action 12 gauge tactical shotgun. Effective at close ranges.
english.1964610944: A French-made assault rifle. Fully automatic.
english.1986944028: This Magpul Folding Defensive Pistol can achieve extremely high rates of fire, and can eliminate someone quickly if sights are kept on target.
english.2369732362: A modern variant of the Walther WA2000. Bullpup rifle designed for high precision damage at far ranges.
english.3083218218: A concealable Baby Browning .25 Covert pistol. Ergonomically designed to pass pat-downs and frisking attempts. Utilizes caseless ammunition and cannot be reloaded while in the field.

english.194463631: A unique "Copperhead" variant of the AI AWM-F. A modern marksman's rifle. Designed for powerful and precise engagements on all ranges, and in a modular fashion, which allows for extensive customization.
english.349678015: A suppressed military variant of the Dragunov SVD. A modern long-distance sniper rifle. Very effective at all ranges, with a medium firing rate.
english.455090967: A unique "Ghost" variant of the Walther WA2000. Designed for high-precision, high-damage engagements on all ranges, and in a modular fashion which allows for extensive customization.
english.810386500: A unique "Redeemer" variant of the Walther WA2000. Designed for fast and accurate engagements on medium to long ranges, and in a modular fashion which allows for extensive customization.
english.1915291591: A unique military variant of the Dragunov SVD. A modern long-distance sniper rifle. Very effective on all ranges, with a medium firing rate.
english.2029453400: A unique "Ice" variant of the Walther WA2000. Designed for fast and accurate engagements at medium-to-long ranges, and in a modular fashion which allows for extensive customization.
english.2223871500: A unique "Snow Fox" variant of the AI AWM-F. A modern marksman's rifle. Designed for powerful and precise engagements at all ranges, and in a modular fashion, which allows for extensive customization.
english.2340245356: A unique "Rude Ruby" variant of the AI AWM-F. A modern marksman's rifle. Designed for powerful and precise engagements at all ranges, and in a modular fashion, which allows for extensive customization.
english.3019617516: A unique "Viper" variant of the Walther WA2000. Designed for fast and accurate engagements at medium-to-long ranges, and in a modular fashion which allows for extensive customization.

english.268816: A "Viper" variant of the Walther WA2000. A classic bullpup sniper rifle designed for precise, medium-range engagements.
english.141562196: Get your rage-game on with this beautifully crafted Kalashnikov AK-47 fully automatic assault rifle. But what makes this truly a special weapon of destruction is that it carries a magazine that can hold up to 60 rounds.
english.416349359: A covert, DTI variant of the UZI. A one-handed machine gun. Lightweight with an excellent rate of fire but low accuracy. Comes with a suppressor.
english.491028493: A covert variant of the UZI. A one-handed machine gun. Lightweight with an excellent rate of fire but low accuracy. Comes with a suppressor.
english.579457892: A covert variant of the LAR Grizzly Big-Boar sniper rifle. The ICA's latest model of the Grizzly is a modern marksman's rifle. Silenced and deadly.
english.782640793: A covert variant of the Remington Model 700P Rifle chambered for the .308 Winchester cartridge. The stock is black polymer; the barrel drilled from the highest-quality metal blend. Comes with a Suppressor.
english.1054547267: A unique "Rude Ruby" variant of the KRISS Vector SRB Covert. This modern SMG is capable of rapid firing and has generous magazine capacity. Despite the loud color it's suppressed for user convenience.
english.1120098045: A pale variant of the Walther PPQ. This is a breach-and-clear handgun that can quickly take out a number of targets with precise headshots. Great for clearing a room without escalating the fight. It's steady, quick, and excellent for close-quarter combat.
english.1517270592: A modified HK UMP45 favored by militia foot soldiers. It packs a maximum amount of damage into a minimum amount of time.
english.1545523143: A covert variant of the LAR Grizzly Big-Boar sniper rifle with a little added flair. Based on the ICA's latest model of the Grizzly, it's as silent to the ear as it is loud to the eye.
english.1654450479: The Ruger Mark II AWC TM-Amphibian "S" is a suppressed low velocity .22 LR pistol. Originally designed for special-forces use and to make as little noise as possible. Ineffective at medium-to-long ranges.
english.1788578409: An "Arctic" variant of the Walther WA2000. Designed for high-precision, high-damage engagements at all ranges.
english.2289137622: The new Mossberg M835A 12 gauge hunting shotgun is great for skeet shooting and duck hunting alike.
english.2347547952: The new Remington Model 700 Woodsman Hunting Rifle is chambered for the .308 Winchester cartridge. The stock is carved from solid walnut; the barrel drilled from the highest-quality metal blend.
english.2543407100: Once upon a time this SMG was a perfectly passable MAC-10. After years of exposure to sea-spray and harsh raiding conditions it's so rusty it's a wonder it still fires.
english.2622086074: Be grand with this beautiful, gold-coated sawed-off shotgun, that will create more damage than needed and more noise than necessary. Because more is good.
english.2767675177: The Ruger Mark II AWC TM-Amphibian "S" is a suppressed low velocity .22 LR pistol. Originally designed for special-forces use and to make as little noise as possible. Ineffective at medium-to-long ranges.
english.2817266057: An ICA variant of the KRISS Vector SRB. A modern SMG. Rapid firing with good magazine capacity.
english.2859880837: A Baby Browning .25 Covert in bold 1970‚Äôs inspired colors. Guards might be fooled by it‚Äôs cuteness, but this is definitely not a toy.
english.2872511091: A DTI variant of the Baby Browning .25 Covert. A concealable pistol. Ergonomically designed to pass pat-downs and frisking attempts. Utilizes caseless ammunition and cannot be reloaded while in the field.
english.2873352539: A covert variant of the Mossberg M535A 12 gauge shotgun. Agile and effective at close ranges. Has a fast fire rate and tight spread. This is the silenced version.
english.3002976041: The new Mossberg M835A Hunter Deluxe is great for skeet shooting and duck hunting alike.
english.3147301724: A DTI variant of the Omni Consumer Products Auto-9 patented firearm used by cyborg law enforcement. Now with fully automatic fire and fairly low recoil.
english.3150713065: A covert, DTI variant of the Walther PPQ. A modern light pistol. Rapid firing with good magazine capacity. Comes with a suppressor.
english.3209872070: A golden, covert variant of the UZI. A one-handed machine gun. Lightweight with an excellent rate of fire but low accuracy. Comes with a suppressor.
english.3554158002: A covert, ICA variant of the KRISS Vector SRB. A modern SMG. Rapid firing with good magazine capacity. Comes with a suppressor.
english.3555185912: An AI AWM-F sniper rifle variant featuring a suppressor, a feline-inspired cosmetic mod, and a black and green fragment design. The perfect weapon for hunters who lie in wait and strike with confidence.
english.3567545069: A custom-built Remington Model 700P Rifle chambered for the .308 Winchester cartridge with a delicately ornamented barrel, a stock built entirely from red-tinted cherry with a beautiful gold trim, and a Chinese-style golden dragon-headed muzzle brake.
english.3684870441: A DTI variant of the Dragunov SVD. A modern long-distance sniper rifle. Very effective at all ranges, with a medium firing rate.
english.3732781086: An updated AK-47 fully-automatic assault rifle with high damage but only semi-accurate.
english.3943065342: A Heckler & Koch G36 Compact tactical assault rifle with a 30 round magazine.
english.3947027254: A modern Mossberg M535A tactical shotgun. Agile and effective at close ranges. Has a fast fire rate and tight spread.
english.3981518135: A covert, DTI variant of the Walther PPQ. A modern light pistol. Rapid firing with good magazine capacity. Comes with a suppressor.
english.4029486415: A DTI variant of the MAC-10. A one-handed machine gun. Lightweight with an excellent rate of fire but low accuracy.
english.4180372101: A unique and magnificently designed Remington Model 700P sniper rifle chambered for the .308 Winchester cartridge. Be majestic like the Peacock and take your shot: you won‚Äôt miss. But would that be too easy?
english.4225196461: A pale variant of the Walther PPQ. This is a breach-and-clear handgun that can quickly take out a number of targets with precise headshots. Great for clearing a room without escalating the fight. It's steady, quick, and excellent for close-quarter combat. Has a homemade spray can silencer.

english.91613560: A U.S. produced pump-action 12 gauge shotgun. Designed for domestic and international markets.
english.137237808: A "Tuatara" variant of the Jaeger 7. A suppressed AI AWM-F Lancer marksman's rifle with body-piercing ammo. Highly accurate and modular, allowing for extensive customization.
english.291081280: A tan variant of the Walther PPQ. A modern light pistol. Rapid firing with good magazine capacity.
english.332641659: A marksman variant of the Tavor CTAR-21C S/A covert bullpup assault rifle. Semi-automatic, accurate, and has a good range with excellent damage. Comes with a suppressor.
english.346968026: A covert variant of the Glock 19M. An Austrian produced light tactical covert pistol. Underpowered.
english.537926015: A tan variant of the Tavor CTAR-21 bullpup assault rifle. Fully-automatic, accurate, and stable with excellent damage.
english.558580887: A covert variant of the HK MP5. A modern SMG. Lightweight and inaccurate.

options.name: Better Naming
options.tooltip: Remove A, ICA, and THE from most item names. Adjusts names for more consistent sorting. Rename the Antique Curved Knife to the Antique Carved Knife. It's not very curved at all, but it does look carved. Fixes capitalization on some misc items.

english.87940950: A remote detonator for the Explosive Sunset Duck.
english.175298864: A proximity device that sends out an electrical surge. Place it in water to electrocute anyone coming within range of it. It will also electrocute any guard trying to pick it up.
english.313146508: A remote detonator for the Micro Explosive.
english.565203114: A remote trigger for the Taser.
english.835442075: A castle torch can light fires. Extinguished when intentionally dropped or placed.
english.1019004497: Can be used to hide a small item.
english.1247132222: A standard ICA briefcase. Can be used to conceal illegal items. Diana and 47 hoarded tons of them during the ICA's Going Out of Business Sale.
english.1253504885: This custom made case can hold a long item like a sniper rifle.
english.1759792262: A small leather bag good for storing an item.
english.1803114615: A remote trigger for the Flash Device.
english.2353389240: A small pumpkin can be thrown to distract or briefly knock down bystanders.
english.2425695387: A remote detonator for the Concussion Device.
english.2968398940: Orson's Watch will start an alarm 30 seconds after it is thrown.
english.3003770792: A remotely detonated large explosive disguised as a Christmas present.
english.3122134463: A very old knife, but still razor sharp. Decorated with lots of carvings. It's not very curvy, though.
english.3283811242: A remotely triggered device that sends out an electrical surge upon detonation.
english.3313961614: This is a banana. Carefully place the banana peel in someone's path for hilarious results.
english.3504140749: A remote trigger for the Flash Phone.
english.3666342999: A small gold bar that can be a non-lethal weapon or thrown as a distraction. If anyone finds this they will most likely take it.
english.4160990769: A remote trigger for the Electrocution Phone.

english.1399876355: A key to the abandoned school which General Zaydan uses as his army field HQ. The key should give access to any lock in the building.

english.301834343: A bunch of ripe Malbec grapes. Carefully place them in someone's path for hilarious results.
english.452941576: A remote trigger for the Micro Taser.
english.2946254040: A white, sturdy leather belt is the perfect accessory to the Straitjacket.
english.3400224792: A proximity Micro Taser small enough to go unnoticed. A device that sends out an electrical surge upon detecting any movement within range.
